original_text: and its five pillars with their hooks. He overlaid their capitals, and their fillets were of gold, but their five bases were of bronze.
korean_text: 휘장 문의 기둥 다섯과 그 갈고리를 만들고 기둥 머리와 그 가름대를 금으로 쌌으며 그 다섯 받침은 놋이었더라

sentences.original_text: and its five pillars with their hooks.
and their fillets were of gold,
but their five bases were of bronze.
